value.message:
Complete AI-Powered Repository Analysis feature (v2.0.0)

This commit completes the implementation of the AI-Powered GitHub Repository
Summary Report feature, adding comprehensive repository analysis capabilities.

## Core Features Implemented

### Repository Analysis Command (spark analyze)
- Intelligent ranking algorithm (30% popularity, 45% activity, 25% health)
- AI-powered summaries via Anthropic Claude Haiku
- Three-tier fallback strategy (AI → Enhanced template → Basic template)
- Multi-window activity analysis (90d/180d/365d)
- Composite scoring for repository ranking

### Data Models
- Repository, CommitHistory, TechnologyStack models
- RepositorySummary with AI and fallback support
- UserProfile for developer analysis
- Report model for complete analysis output

### Dependency Analysis
- Multi-ecosystem support: NPM, PyPI, RubyGems, Go, Maven, NuGet
- .NET/NuGet support with .csproj parsing
- Version currency assessment with semantic versioning
- 7-day cache TTL with hybrid caching strategy

### Enhanced Statistics
- .NET SDK version detection from TargetFramework
- "Days ago" formatting for dates (created, pushed, releases)
- **Tier 1**: Contributors count, repository size, language count
- **Quality Focus**: CI/CD detection, tests, LICENSE, documentation
- **Activity Focus**: Release count, latest release date, commit velocity

### CLI Enhancements
- spark analyze --user <username>
- --list-only for dry-run preview
- --top-n for custom repository count
- --output for custom directory
- Progress indicators and graceful error handling

### Documentation
- Comprehensive docs/analyze-command.md (450+ lines)
- Updated getting-started.md with API key setup
- CHANGELOG.md with version 2.0.0 announcement
- Sample report in output/reports/

### Testing
- 17+ integration tests covering all user stories
- Unit tests for ranking, parsing, version checking
- Edge case validation and performance testing

## Files Changed
- Created: CHANGELOG.md, docs/analyze-command.md
- Created: src/spark/dependencies/ (analyzer, parser, version_checker)
- Created: 7 test files (integration + unit)
- Modified: Repository model with 9 new fields
- Modified: CLI with dependency analysis integration
- Modified: ReportGenerator with enhanced output
- Modified: setup.py (version 2.0.0)
- Modified: config/spark.yml (analyzer section, nuget support)

## Constitution Compliance
✅ Python-First: All modules independently importable
✅ CLI Interface: Full CLI access for local testing
✅ Data Privacy: Explicit public-only repository filter
✅ Testability: Comprehensive test coverage
✅ Observable: Progress tracking and detailed logging
✅ Performance: <3-minute target for 50 repositories
✅ Configuration: YAML-based with env overrides
